Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-la
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Wo que yi jiang “gulanjing” lingxing di jiang shi ni
gu ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue. Ni buyao shuncong tamen zhong renhe fanzui de ren, huo gu en de ren
Ni yingdang zhaoxi jinian ni de zhu de zun ming
yeli, ni yingdang yi xiao bufen shijian xiang ta koutou, yi da bufen shijian zansong ta
Zhe deng ren dique aihao xianshi, er hushi weilai de yanzhong de yi ri
Wo chuangzaole tamen, bing shi tamen de tige jianshi. Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiang yi xiang tamen yiyang de ren daiti tamen
Zhe que shi jiaohui, shei yuanyi juewu, shei keyi ze qu yitiao daoda ta de zhu de daolu
Chu zhenzhu yiyu wai, nimen jue bu yiyu. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de
Ta shi tasuo yiyu de ren, ru zai ta de ci'en zhong. Zhiyu bu yi de renmen, ta yi wei tamen yubeile tongku de xingfa
